TITLE: Calories manager
HOME_DESCRIPTION: Java Enterprise project with registration / authorization and role-based interface (USER, ADMIN). The administrator can create / edit / delete / users, and the user - to manage their and profile data (day, food, calories) through the UI interface with the basic authorization. Data may be filtered by date and time, and the color recording food table depends on whether exceeds the amount of calories per day rate (editable parameter in the user profile).
